snippet.title: Thief Simulator VR Announcement Trailer [Early Access]
snippet.description:
More info on Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1019550/Thief_Simulator_VR/

Join us on Discord! - https://discord.gg/BVQzk3s

Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a real thief? Now you can see for yourself in Thief Simulator VR! Steal in free roam sandbox neighborhoods. Observe your target and gather information that will help you with the burglary. Take the challenge and rob the best secured houses. And… don’t get caught!
